items.name: Users can navigate to the MyUCLA website
items.description: Users can access the MyUCLA website by entering the URL or clicking on a link.

items.name: Users can view the website's navigation menu
items.description: Users can see the website's navigation menu, which allows them to access different sections of the website.

items.name: Users can view the website's date and time
items.description: Users can see the current date and time displayed on the website.

items.name: Users can view events and their details
items.description: Users can view a list of events and their details, including the event description, organization, and time.

items.name: Users can toggle event details
items.description: Users can click on a button to toggle the display of event details, such as the event description and organization.

items.name: Users can view events that are happening now
items.description: Users can see a list of events that are currently happening, marked as 'Happening Now'.

items.name: Users can view events that are happening in the future
items.description: Users can see a list of events that are scheduled to happen in the future.

items.name: Users can view events that have already happened
items.description: Users can see a list of events that have already occurred.

items.name: Users can search for events
items.description: Users can search for specific events by entering keywords or phrases.

items.name: Users can filter events by category
items.description: Users can filter events by category, such as sports, music, or art.

items.name: Users can sort events by date or time
items.description: Users can sort events by date or time, allowing them to view events in a specific order.

items.name: Users can view event descriptions
items.description: Users can view the detailed description of an event, including information about the event, its location, and its organizers.

items.name: Users can view event organizers
items.description: Users can view the organizers of an event, including their names and affiliations.

items.name: Users can view event times
items.description: Users can view the start and end times of an event, including any recurring events.

items.name: Users can view event locations
items.description: Users can view the location of an event, including its address and any relevant information about the location.

items.name: Users can view event tags
items.description: Users can view any relevant tags or keywords associated with an event, such as 'music' or 'sports'.

items.name: Users can view event images
items.description: Users can view any images or multimedia associated with an event, such as photos or videos.

items.name: Users can view event videos
items.description: Users can view any videos associated with an event, such as promotional videos or event highlights.

items.name: Users can view event audio
items.description: Users can view any audio associated with an event, such as podcasts or audio recordings.

items.name: Users can view event documents
items.description: Users can view any documents associated with an event, such as flyers or brochures.

items.name: Users can view event maps
items.description: Users can view any maps associated with an event, such as maps of the event location or surrounding area.

items.name: Users can view event reviews
items.description: Users can view any reviews or ratings associated with an event, such as reviews from attendees or ratings from event organizers.

items.name: Users can view event comments
items.description: Users can view any comments or discussions associated with an event, such as comments from attendees or discussions about the event.

items.name: Users can view event ratings
items.description: Users can view any ratings or scores associated with an event, such as ratings from attendees or scores from event organizers.

items.name: Users can view event statistics
items.description: Users can view any statistics or metrics associated with an event, such as attendance numbers or engagement metrics.

items.name: Users can view event analytics
items.description: Users can view any analytics or data associated with an event, such as website traffic or social media engagement.

items.name: Users can view event reports
items.description: Users can view any reports or summaries associated with an event, such as attendance reports or financial reports.

items.name: Users can view event evaluations
items.description: Users can view any evaluations or assessments associated with an event, such as evaluations from attendees or assessments from event organizers.

items.name: Users can view event feedback
items.description: Users can view any feedback or suggestions associated with an event, such as feedback from attendees or suggestions from event organizers.

items.name: Users can view event surveys
items.description: Users can view any surveys or questionnaires associated with an event, such as surveys from attendees or questionnaires from event organizers.

items.name: Users can view event polls
items.description: Users can view any polls or voting systems associated with an event, such as polls from attendees or voting systems from event organizers.

items.name: Users can view event quizzes
items.description: Users can view any quizzes or assessments associated with an event, such as quizzes from attendees or assessments from event organizers.

items.name: Users can view event games
items.description: Users can view any games or interactive activities associated with an event, such as games from attendees or interactive activities from event organizers.

items.name: Users can view event challenges
items.description: Users can view any challenges or competitions associated with an event, such as challenges from attendees or competitions from event organizers.

items.name: Users can view event awards
items.description: Users can view any awards or recognition associated with an event, such as awards from attendees or recognition from event organizers.

items.name: Users can view event certificates
items.description: Users can view any certificates or documentation associated with an event, such as certificates from attendees or documentation from event organizers.
